Performer:
Takemoto Mojitayū IX (see also Takemoto Sumitayū VII) (竹本文字大夫 (九))

Alternate Name: Takemoto Sumitayū VII (竹本住大夫 (七))

Dates: '1960-1985/04'

Specialty: Tayu

Notes: Bunraku meikan (1980, 1985, 1988, 1990, 1994)


– Click image to view.
